name: City Night Rider
description:
Time to take a Ride on your neon glowing motor bike and make a visit to favorite Vegas hill. O yeah! its party time in Vegas and I am coming on my Fast Ride.

How To Play

Just press Space bar button and It will accelerate automatically.

Ride the Vegas JACKPOT and score big in the night of the City.

Vegas City Night - Neon Rider FEATURES

Real time changing environment
Glowing Neon Bikes
Moving platform
Glowing Coins
Dangerous Climbs and jumps
Double Jump
